data.name: Memoria Demo
data.detailed_description: The current version that we released is the Alpha version of Memoria. This means that this is a demo with a playtime of about 20 minutes. The demo demonstrates the core game mechanics and introduces the story to the player.
data.about_the_game: The current version that we released is the Alpha version of Memoria. This means that this is a demo with a playtime of about 20 minutes. The demo demonstrates the core game mechanics and introduces the story to the player.
data.short_description: The current version that we released is the Alpha version of Memoria. This means that this is a demo with a playtime of about 20 minutes. The demo demonstrates the core game mechanics and introduces the story to the player.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) , Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 20.04, Ubuntu 18.04, and CentOS 7
  • Processor: x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
